name: Nishal NM
about: I'm a Computer Science undergraduate with a passion for technology, especially in Python, web development, and database management. I love working on real-world projects and solving problems through code. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new technologies, learning new skills, and building things that make a difference. I'm always eager to grow and take on new challenges in the tech world.
tech: I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve problems, continuously improving my skills, and contributing to impactful projects through innovative and collaborative efforts.
